dcterms:creator: Alex Krizhevsky
Geoffrey Hinton
dcterms:description: CIFAR-100 dataset consists of 100 classes, each of which contains 50,000 training images. It is used to evaluate the performance of the proposed method in few-shot class-incremental learning.
dcterms:title: CIFAR-100

dcterms:creator: Olga Russakovsky
Jia Deng
Hao Su
Jonathan Krause
Sanjeev Satheesh
Sean Ma
Zhiheng Huang
Andrej Karpathy
Aditya Khosla
Michael Bernstein
dcterms:description: mini-ImageNet is a smaller part of ImageNet, which has 50,000 training images from 100 chosen classes. It is used as a benchmark for evaluating few-shot class-incremental learning methods.
dcterms:title: mini-ImageNet

dcterms:creator: Catherine Wah
Steve Branson
Peter Welinder
Pietro Perona
Serge Belongie
dcterms:description: CUB-200 is a fine-grained classification dataset containing 200 bird species with about 6,000 training images. It is used to evaluate the proposed method in few-shot class-incremental learning.
dcterms:title: CUB-200

dcterms:creator: Jianxiong Xiao
James Hays
Krista A Ehinger
Aude Oliva
Antonio Torralba
dcterms:description: SUN-397 is a large-scale scene understanding dataset containing 397 distinct scene classes with about 76,000 training images. It is used to evaluate the proposed method in scenarios with more classes and more incremental sessions.
dcterms:title: SUN-397

dcterms:creator: Catherine Wah
Steve Branson
Peter Welinder
Pietro Perona
Serge Belongie
dcterms:description: CUB-200* is a variant of CUB-200 but excludes the base session. It is used to evaluate whether the proposed method works in scenarios without the base session.
dcterms:title: CUB-200*
